ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: i m sorry but it sounds like you are the whiner.  Let people enjoy the game the way they would like to enjoy it.  if people don t want to experience it the way
ygData.messageBody:
i'm sorry but it sounds like you are the whiner. Let
people enjoy the game the way they would like to enjoy
it. if people don't want to experience it the way you
do...oh well. i don't remember paying you the $10 a
month to police activity in the game.

my 2 cents

Verin - Karana Server

--- Neil Lambert <smartass@...> wrote:
> From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
> ok, question: i'm 16th level. i could not possibly
> get a flowing black robe.
> but what if my lower level character has one? i
> didn't give it to the
> char... is that twinking? I do not believe it is,
> unless you have some guild
> give you a lot of money to go get one.
>
> but if i give my lower level char some hugely valued
> item for the fun of it,
> it's twinking. i'd appreciate it if you would all
> back off. i already
> reported it and IT IS AGAINST the rules. stop
> whining
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, May 24, 1999 2:01 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards]
> Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>
>
> >From: Wizard <wizard@...>
> >
> >I just started a new caracter in freeport, as i go
> to newbee area i see all
> >around me killing snakes and bats was people with
> full banded mail all lv 1
> >or 2 i have seen in 6 hours more then 10 full
> armored people. And i dont
> >have any problem about it!
> >If they transfered items from their high lv
> caracters or if guild give it
> >to them its ok for me i go around killing my bats
> and snakes and they do it
> >in same way without skills they must work much
> things a same way as you do
> >a little bit easier but they alredy worked for it.
> >I played a long time a everquest creating some
> middle lv caracter and i
> >know how dificult it is to start it all over if
> you have find that your
> >caracter is not what you wish and you decite to
> start new class.
> >Im shure that a people wich complain are ones wich
> have enugh money and
> >free time to play as long as they wish, ohers wich
> cannot support to pay a
> >10 $ a month and 1 $ a hour (as connection rates to
> internet go in europe)
> >i aprove fully to transfer their items to new
> started caracter. If this is
> >possible to do in game then its ok to do if you
> wish to pay 100 $ a month
> >so that you can have a payed gm controling every
> transaction in game then
> >its ok for you send email to Sony saying that you
> are ready to pay 100 $ a
> >month to play a game where every move will be GM
> controled so wou can be
> >shure that every caracter is not twinked ;-), They
> willl accept this idea
> >gladly as soon they start reciving your bucks.
> >
> >About guild camping im strongly against it i
> support idea that if person
> >wich killes a monster is more then 5 lv higher then
> loot will be only
> >normal one and for special items only a 1/3 of
> normal chance or not at all
> >so higer lv players wishing one item must buy it
> from a low lv players. it
> >will be a nice push to player interaction.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >Silverion
> >High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
> >Fenin Ro
> >
